etymology.interpretation: The character 戶(戶) (hù, "household; door") resembles the side view of a gate, representing its function as an entrance or access point similar to a door or household entry.

examples.chinese: 每户人家都有自己的故事(每戶人家都有自己的故事)。
examples.pinyin: Měi hù rénjiā dōu yǒu zìjǐ de gùshì.
examples.english: Every household has its own story.

examples.chinese: 这个小区住着数百户(這個小區住著數百戶)，居民和睦相处(居民和睦相處)。
examples.pinyin: Zhège xiǎoqū zhùzhe shù bǎi hù, jūmín hémù xiāngchǔ.
examples.english: Hundreds of households live in this community, and the residents live in harmony.
